name: Bombercode
description:
Bombercode is a programming game where you code your bot in JavaScript to win a Bomberman-like match.

The coding is done in the embedded editor.

In the future, I would like to add the ability to play against other players' bots in a cloud enviroment with leaderboards.

At the moment the game only works on Windows, but I would like to make it available on other platforms too.
